title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This course introduces you to the fundamentals of C programming. You'll learn the basics of syntax.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Dive into the world of algorithms with this course. You'll explore algorithm design and analysis.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Learn C++ in the context of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). This course covers C++ programming.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: This course focuses on essential data structures like arrays, linked lists, and stacks.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Get started with Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python. You'll explore classes, inheritance, and more.

title: Software Engineering
details: Dive into the principles and practices of software engineering. This course covers software development.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Learn about Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing. This course covers cloud infrastructure.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Dive into the world of databases with a focus on MySQL. This course covers database design and SQL.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. It covers various problem-solving techniques
